artist: Artist: Ogata Gekkō; Publisher: Matsuki Heikichi
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: vertical ōban triptych; triptych that connects to form a single image; battle scene; group of soldiers in combat in left and center images; soldier forcefully entering a doorway, grabbing a figure by the scalp in ULQ of left sheet; group of trees with billowing smoke in center; group of trees in the URQ of right image, with faint mountains and figures in ULQ of sheet
inscription: on center sheet, on back, in LRC, in pencil: 9383 | ID
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
text: Printed publication of 1895 without information which month, presumably March.
title: Fierce Battle in the Streets of Niuzhuang
